author: Staff Reporter
text:
Till March 22, the election static surveillance teams and flying squads have seized cash to the tune of Rs. 44,63,520 and things worth Rs. 24,59,460 during vehicle checks across the 13 Assembly constituencies in Vellore district.

Cash to the tune of Rs. 10,57,020 was seized in four separate checks including at Tirupattur town and Udayamuthur in Tirupattur assembly constituency, of while Rs. 2,94,000 was seized in two checks at Patchur in Jolarpet constituency.

The team seized Rs. 99,000 in Anaicut constituency, Rs. 28,20,000 from Agavalam in Sholinghur constituency and Rs. 1,93,500 at Poongodu village in Arcot.

The flying squad seized 300 cotton sarees worth Rs. 1,07,000 during a check at Venkatespuram in Arakkonam.

As many as 14,800 lungis worth Rs. 23,52,460 were seized at Kasam in Katpadi, according to a press release.

Was seized in four separate checks including one at Tirupattur town and Udayamuthur in Tirupattur
title: Over Rs. 44 lakh seized by flying squads
